alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 3:39AM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will move into northern Oneida County late this morning, and will be heavy at times during the afternoon and evening. Precipitation will change to a mix of freezing rain, sleet and drizzle tonight. The mixed precipitation will change back to lake effect snow showers around daybreak Thursday, continuing through the day.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5-1-1.
